message_needaction.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_has_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

message_has_error_counter.help: Number of messages with delivery error

message_has_sms_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

name_searchable.help: This dummy field lets us use another search method on the field 'name'.This allows more freedom on how to search the 'name' compared to 'filter_domain'.See '_search_name' and '_parse_name_search' for why this is not possible with 'filter_domain'.

type_tax_use.help: Determines where the tax is selectable. Note: 'None' means a tax can't be used by itself, however it can still be used in a group. 'adjustment' is used to perform tax adjustment.

tax_scope.help: Restrict the use of taxes to a type of product.

amount_type.help:
- Group of Taxes: The tax is a set of sub taxes.
    - Fixed: The tax amount stays the same whatever the price.
    - Percentage: The tax amount is a % of the price:
        e.g 100 * (1 + 10%) = 110 (not price included)
        e.g 110 / (1 + 10%) = 100 (price included)
    - Percentage Tax Included: The tax amount is a division of the price:
        e.g 180 / (1 - 10%) = 200 (not price included)
        e.g 200 * (1 - 10%) = 180 (price included)

active.help: Set active to false to hide the tax without removing it.

sequence.help: The sequence field is used to define order in which the tax lines are applied.

price_include.help: Determines whether the price you use on the product and invoices includes this tax.

company_price_include.help: Default on whether the sales price used on the product and invoices with this Company includes its taxes.

price_include_override.help: Overrides the Company's default on whether the price you use on the product and invoices includes this tax.

include_base_amount.help: If set, taxes with a higher sequence than this one will be affected by it, provided they accept it.

is_base_affected.help: If set, taxes with a lower sequence might affect this one, provided they try to do it.

analytic.help: If set, the amount computed by this tax will be assigned to the same analytic account as the invoice line (if any)

tax_exigibility.help:
Based on Invoice: the tax is due as soon as the invoice is validated.
Based on Payment: the tax is due as soon as the payment of the invoice is received.

cash_basis_transition_account_id.help: Account used to transition the tax amount for cash basis taxes. It will contain the tax amount as long as the original invoice has not been reconciled ; at reconciliation, this amount cancelled on this account and put on the regular tax account.

invoice_repartition_line_ids.help: Distribution when the tax is used on an invoice

refund_repartition_line_ids.help: Distribution when the tax is used on a refund

country_id.help: The country for which this tax is applicable.

country_code.help:
The ISO country code in two chars. 
You can use this field for quick search.

invoice_legal_notes.help: Legal mentions that have to be printed on the invoices.
